generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings and a "BUS" marking, indicating it is a road for vehicle traffic.
- sidewalk: A sidewalk is visible on the right side of the road, adjacent to parked cars and buildings.
- building: Several residential and commercial buildings are visible along both sides of the road.
- vegetation: Trees and bushes are present along the road and in front of the buildings.
- sky: The sky is visible above the buildings and trees, showing a partly cloudy day.
- person: A person can be seen walking on the sidewalk in the distance.
- car: Multiple cars are visible on the road, including a silver sedan and a white van.
- truck: A large truck with a cylindrical tank is partially visible on the left side of the image.
- traffic light: A traffic light is visible hanging over the road ahead.
- traffic sign: Several traffic signs are visible, including a "No Entry" sign and a "Bus Lane" sign.
- pole: Traffic light poles and other poles are visible supporting the traffic lights and signs.
